org.crosswire.jsword.index.lucene.analysis
类 AnalyzerFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.jsword.index.lucene.analysis.AnalyzerFactory

public final class AnalyzerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory creating the appropriate Analyzer for natural language analysis of text for Lucene Indexing and Query Parsing. Note: [Lang] refers to CommonName for ISO639 Language Dependency: Analyzer from lucene contrib: lucene-analyzers-[version].jar, lucene-smartcn-[version].jar, lucene-snowball-[version].jar Properties used: : Default.Analyzer : The default analyzer class [Lang].Analyzer : Appropriate Analyzer class to be used for the language of the book

作者：
Sijo Cherian [sijocherian at yahoo dot com]

for license details.
